title: Short-Intensive Course on Virtual Learning Systems for Military Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Military science education using smartphone-based virtual learning systems in limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners complete military science content in virtual classrooms with an 80% or higher completion rate
Learners perform peer assessment and feedback activities using collaborative tools in a mobile environment at least three times.
Learners submit a military operation simulation project through a virtual learning system with 90% completion accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
